name: Get Out! (itch) (yuvalz19500)
description:
You wakeup in a dark room to a mysterious and annoying voice...
To escape the room you will have to solve puzzles and riddles. But remember, creativity is the key to get out of this place.

Created by:
- Danny Khodos
- Yuval Gonen
- Adi Amshalem
- Omri Kadouri
- Yuval Zarfati
